name: Equilibrium (itch) (MissingAlibi)
description:
You are fighting against the humanity that forest all the world, just for they own progression. You will need to re-plant the trees that they consume without knowing that they are killing them self.

With the power of the rain, you can figth back the fire that this humans create. You can stop they progression by planting trees beside the cities but keep in mind that without trees you will not have the seeds and without seed you can't plant.

So, you will have to choose what to sacrify for the greater good of life.

Made for Global Game Jam 2022: Duality

Programmers Joel Coyos / @JoelCoyos Marquez Damian / marquez_damian_

SFX and Music Lucía Roig Seigneur / @udeuchi

3D Art Francisco José senestrari / @franse_art
